name: Sealed Inner Sanctum Pass
raw: ------------------------------ Ingredients ------------------------------ #L "Exarch Robe" "204759" ------------------------------ Recipe ------------------------------ Give it to the Blind Cultist outside TOTW to receive #L "Sealed Inner Sanctum Pass" "207107" ------------------------------ Comments ------------------------------ Your pass to the inner sanctum. Robes drop from exarches in totw.
